ORDER BY s.stSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT tm.tmNameAb, s.stSeq, s.stUse, s.stDelNy, s.stName, s.stNameKor, s.stAdress, s.stRegTime, s.stModTime, s.team_tmSeq
from stadium s left join team tm ON s.team_tmSeq = tm.tmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND s.stSeq = #{stSeq}
